| HistoryText             = A group of 1960's era [[Union of Soviet Socialist Republics|Soviet]] agents who were put into cryogenic sleep during the Cold War, to be woken up in the event of a nuclear attack on [[United States of America|U.S.]] soil to act as a "clean up crew." The team was woken up accidentally after an enormous explosion was set off off the coast of [[California (State)|California]] during a fight between the [[Infernal Man (Earth-616)|Infernal Man]] and the [[Order (Initiative) (Earth-616)|Order]].{{r|The Order Vol 2 1}}{{r|The Order Vol 2 2}}

The Order fought the Soviet Super-Soldiers, defeating them after Order member [[Milo Fields (Earth-616)|Supernaut]] killed the five Soviet agents controlling the Super-Soldiers from their homebase on [[Drenkov Island]]. In response, [[Crimson Dynamo XI (Earth-616)|Crimson Dynamo]] attempted to self-destruct with a nuclear bomb hidden in its armor, only for Order member [[Rebecca Ryan (Earth-616)|Aralune]] to use her powers and render the explosion harmless.{{r|The Order Vol 2 2}}
